```{r echo = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
student_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/students.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble()
knitr::kable(student_table, format="html") %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", 
                                                  "hover",
                                                  "responsive"))
```
